messages.title: Discuz Hub
messages.description: Easy, lightweight and open-sourced android app for discuz! mobile
messages.intro.title: Discuz Hub
messages.intro.description: Easy, lightweight and open-sourced android app for discuz! mobile
messages.intro.function_annotate: The bbs needs to turn on mobile page and disable native anti-spam filter
messages.intro.administrator_note: You may use this link to make your bbs compatible with us!ğŸ‘‰
messages.feature.lightweight_annotate: Apk is less than 20MB but still supports most discuz! operations
messages.feature.open_source_annotate: The project is open-sourced with MIT License and hosted at github
messages.feature.android_support_annotate: App is compatible with new Android Q features(Dark mode and permission etcs)
messages.feature.green_android_convention_support: The app is designed coordinated with green android convention version 4.0
messages.about.about_description: The project (Discuz Hub) is open-sourced with MIT License

messages.contact.contact_description: You may contact me with the following links

messages.test-my-bbs.title: Comaptibility test with discuz!
messages.test-my-bbs.data-source-note: The page will use your broswer as client to broswe API, please make sure your network is reachable
messages.test-my-bbs.warn_enter_to_check_problem: Press enter key to get error information
messages.test-my-bbs.warn_need_protocol: You need to add HTTP or HTTPS protocol
messages.test-my-bbs.bbs_pass_result: The BBS passed with primary test but still needs further concern
messages.test-my-bbs.bbs_not_pass_result: Oops, your bbs cannot work with discuzHub
messages.test-my-bbs.app_add_guide: You can add {name} to discuzHub by URL: {url}
messages.privacy.welcome_to_read: Welcome to read the privacy policy
messages.term_of_service.welcome_to_read: Welcome to read the our terms of services
messages.index.cross_platform_content: Use DiscuzHub for most discuz! BBS - Native app for discussing, polling and friending
messages.index.speed_and_performance_content:
Using up-to-date API and following green android convention, our app have only 6 Megabytes 
 Discuzhub puts you in control over practice. Requring light-weight APIs and packages, the app can run smoothly on low-profile devices.
messages.index.powerful_tool_content: By open-sourced packages, discuzhub now can handle variety of messages. Using Discuz! open native API, you can enjoy native services which ensures your data safety. Keep compatible and safe all on your browsing.
messages.index.open_source_content: Licensed by MIT, you can watch, change and redistribute software on your own. The software is on your oyster.
messages.index.fork_on_github_content: Are you developer? Please feel free to star, fork and make pull request to us!
messages.open_source.open_source_subtitle: As a open source software, we build with these library
messages.open_source.discuzHub_licence_descriptio: DiscuzHub is open-sourced with MIT Licence
messages.compatibility.compatibility_subtitle: The web administrator can better display BBS on DiscuzHub
messages.add_bbs.add_bbs_title: Guide for users to add a BBS
